detail_desc: Block-coloured tri suit in fast-drying functional fabric in a narrow cut at the top. Deep neckline at the back with a horizontal elastic strap across the top.
Soft jersey vest top with lace details and a wrapover front for easier nursing access.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Cold shoulder blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck and tie detail at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce on the shoulders and at the cuffs. An elasticated seam at the waist, and a flounce at the hem.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Alice bands in various designs. One glittery and two satin-covered, one with a bow appliqué.
Shirt in a soft weave with a collar, buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.

Narrow waist bag designed for running with a small but stretchy zipped compartment, an adjustable elastic strap with a plastic fastener, and reflective details. Compartment dimensions when empty 5x19.5 cm, when stretched approx. 9x19.5 cm.
Ballet pumps in glittery imitation leather with a bow at the front and loop at the back. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved, fitted jersey top with a slightly deeper neckline.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a soft silk and cotton blend with a collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides of the hem.
Sandals with narrow straps at the top that tie around the ankle. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a wide neckline, elastication and a broderie anglaise flounce at the top, and a smocked hem.

Fitted blouse in a cotton weave. Deep V-neck front and back with smocking and three rows of flounces, and a visible zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a flared peplum that has a slit at the back.

Set containing a bodysuit and trousers in studier cotton-blend jersey. A print at the front and raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour with ribbing at the cuffs. Elasticated waist, a kangaroo pocket at the front, press-studs at the crotch and ribbed hems.
Soft slippers with elastication around the opening. Soft linings and insoles and soft, imitation leather soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.

Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist that has a frill trim and tie belt. Zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener, patch front pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted coat in recycled wool and recycled polyester with notch lapels. Chest pocket, diagonal welt side pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in a textured organic cotton weave with a bow.

Oversized jacket in washed denim with worn details. Collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and flap chest pockets with a button. Buttons at the cuffs and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides of the hem.
Metal-chain bracelet with fixed pendants that have different motifs. Adjustable length.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a decorative opening at the top, a concealed zip at the back and long, wide sleeves with cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with soft faux fur on the front and back. Zip at the top, embroidery, appliqués and sequins on the front and a shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size approx. 6x11x14 cm.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved dress in sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Dress in soft, patterned jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck, decorative frills and seam at the top.
Imitation suede mules with open toes, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels, 7 cm.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with covered elastication at the waist and a button band with decorative buttons down the front. Gently flared with an overlocked hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved cropped top in lace and mesh with a low-cut back with fasteners and an elasticated seam at the hem with a wide lace trim.
Bell-shaped, knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side. Lined.
Long dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Short cardigan knitted in soft tape yarn with a V-neck, long sleeves and a wrapover front with ties at the hem.
Small shoulder bag with a zipped outer compartment, a zip at the top, a narrow shoulder strap and an inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5.5x14x18.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Cardigan in textured-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with a fabric band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with faux-fur appliqués, sequins and embroidery. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with a wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy and sewn-in creases down the legs.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool in a relaxed fit with a boat neck and long dolman sleeves.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Microfibre hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Clutch bag in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather. Flap with a decorative strap and metal buckle, and a concealed magnetic fastener. Metal chain shoulder strap and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x9x19 cm.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with ties at the front. Long sleeves with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in cotton poplin with a button-down collar, open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Buttons at the back and a gathered seam at the waist. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in soft, rib-knit wool.
Knee-high boots in imitation suede with satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 4 cm.
Short dress in denim with a lace-trimmed collar. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tapered waist. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with short cap sleeves. Pleats at the front of the neckline and a zip at the back. Detachable belt with a covered metal buckle at the waist, and a slit at the back. Unlined.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.

Dress in jersey made from a viscose blend containing glittery threads. Long, wide sleeves with a seam just below the shoulders and elasticated cuffs, a gathered seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Make-up bag in semi-transparent plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size approx. 9x9.5x17.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with a round neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainers in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Shirt in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave in a slightly wider style with flap chest pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Short, fitted dress in velour with sequined embroidery on the front, a concealed zip at the back, shoulder pads and long sleeves. Lined.
Long, straight-cut dress in softly draping silk with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Deep armholes and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.

Boxy-style top in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Ribbed trim with a contrasting colour stripe around the neckline, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, round neckline and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Round handbag in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. Two handles and a zip at the top, a narrow shoulder strap and an inner compartment. Lined. Width 6 cm, diameter 25 cm.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and short sleeves.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and long puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a draped band and a flared skirt with a bell-shaped flounce at the hem. Lined.
Trousers in stretch, lightweight twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, and detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
